artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a folded hand-colored engraving of a woman in fashionable period dress and her accessories (P.15,497-P.15,498) and a folded black and white engraving of a music sheet with the score on the recto and verso (P.15,500)
medium: Hand-colored engraving; engraved musical score; letterpress
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Treizième Cahier, 25 Juin 1790
